original_title: La façade - de l'ancien Palais de la Porte Dorée
overview: The Palais de la Porte Dorée was opened in 1931 after 18 months of construction on the occasion of the Paris Colonial Exhibition.The bas-relief on the facade, designed by Alfred Janniot, illustrates life in the former overseas territories of the French colonial power, as it corresponded to the official representation of the time.
title: La façade - de l'ancien Palais de la Porte Dorée
